page.title: 08Corseford School Johnstone
page.content: "A day in my life is very uneventful.I attend Corseford Residential School for the disabled.I am 16 years old and I've been attending the school for several years and I will be leaving in three weeks time. During the last year I have found it very annoying as it was not possible for me to do what an able bodied 16 year old normally does.My school is some distance from a built up area and we seldom meet with people living in the community.I find it difficult to keep in contact with my friends as my home is in Dumfriesshire. I hope that when the people of the future will read this,there will be more intergration of the disabled into normal schools.I hope by that time the prejudices that face us are abolished."
